document_data.name: Dreaming Dragon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dreaming Dragon''' was a tavern located near the [[Downriver Gate]] within [[Everlund]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Elves]] and [[halfling]]s loved the establishment because every night a great story and ballad would be heard.
document_data.Food and drink: The [[elverquisst]] at the Dragon was of a particularly fine quality.
